section1.name: Triangle
content: Area of Triangle = ½ × base × height

section2.name: Square
content: • Opposite sides are parallel and equal in length.

section3.name: Rectangle
content: • Opposite sides are equal in length and parallel.

section4.name: Circle
content: • A circle is a locus of points equidistant from a fixed point called the center.

section5.name: Parallelogram
content: In a parallelogram, the opposite sides are parallel and equal. But all 4 sides are not equal.

section6.name: Rhombus
content: A rhombus is a parallelogram where all 4 sides are equal.

section7.name: Trapezium
content: In a trapezium, one set of opposite sides are parallel and unequal. The other set of opposite sides are not parallel.

section9.name: Cuboid
content: • Volume of a cuboid = length × breadth × height = l × b × h

section11.name: Sphere
content: • Curved Surface Area = Total Surface Area = 4πr²

section13.name: Prism
content: • Lateral Surface Area = Perimeter of the base × height
• Total Surface Area = LSA + 2 × (Area of base)

section14.name: Pyramid
content: • Volume of a pyramid = 1/3 × Base area × height
• Lateral Surface Area = ½ × Perimeter of the base × Slant height
• Total Surface Area = LSA + Area of the base
